Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_GetOrganizationWorkGroup' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_GetOrganizationWorkGroup] GO CREATE VIEW v_GetOrganizationWorkGroup AS with OrgWorkGroup as ( select CompanyID,workgroupid,Description from EPCompanyTree where Description = 'Company Organization' union all select t.CompanyID,t.workgroupid,t.Description from EPCompanyTree t, OrgWorkGroup v where t.ParentWGID = v.WorkGroupID and t.CompanyID = v.CompanyID ) select * from OrgWorkGroup
